sentences.english: And she said , We are all just prisoners here, of our own device.
sentences.chinese: 她卻說，“我們都只不過是作繭自縛哦。”

sentences.english: Some of Ms. Brooks' statements along the way later came back to haunt her.
sentences.chinese: 布魯克斯發表的一些言論後來使她作繭自縛。

attempting nothing and accomplishing nothing (idiom); without any initiative or drive/feckless

virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
